name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Solutions Engineer with 8 years of experience, I have a strong command of **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **AI** technologies, including conversational agents like **Claude** and **ChatGPT**. My expertise in **API** integration and workflow automation using tools like **N8N** ensures high-quality solutions tailored to client needs. I thrive in environments that require problem-solving, creativity, and autonomy, complemented by my empathetic approach to client interactions.
Additionally, I possess extensive knowledge in full-stack development with technologies such as **React**, **Node.js**, and **Python**, alongside deep cloud experience with **Azure** and **AWS**. My background includes leading the development of enterprise-grade platforms that seamlessly integrate AI capabilities, utilizing **FastAPI**, **Django**, and robust CI/CD automation practices. I am committed to building secure applications that comply with industry standards and contributing to innovative solutions.
